data.title: Petrochemicals complex profile: Notore Chemical Industries Onne Complex, Nigeria
data.meta_description: Notore Chemical Industries Onne Complex is an active petrochemical complex located in Rivers State in Nigeria.
data.text:
Key products capacity - Notore Chemical Industries Onne Complex, 2022

Key products produced in this complex include urea, and ammonia.

Urea accounts for the majority of the total annual capacity of the complex, followed by ammonia.

Details of key upcoming projects in Notore Chemical Industries Onne Complex

The complex is set to add capacity with upcoming plants including Notore Chemical Industries Onne Ammonia Plant Expansion, Notore Chemical Industries Onne Methanol Plant, and Notore Chemical Industries Onne Urea Plant Expansion.

About Notore Chemical Industries

Notore Chemical Industries Plc (Notore), a subsidiary of Notore Chemical Industries Mauritius Ltd, is an agro-allied, chemicals, power and infrastructure company. It operates through its fertilizers, power and infrastructure, and seeds businesses. The companyâ€™s fertilizers segment produces and supplies granular urea, NPK (nitrogen, phosphate and potassium) fertilizers, and ammonia and seeds division develops and markets rice and maize. Notore provides gas, power and water to steel plants, oil and gas companies, petrochemicals and other allied industries through its power and infrastructure business. It operates fertilizer plants in Nigeria and Sub-Saharan Africa and has additional offices in Lagos and Abuja, Nigeria. Notore Chemical is headquartered in Onne, Rivers State, Nigeria.

For more details on the Notore Chemical Industries Onne Complex, buy the profile here.

This content was updated on 14 May 2024
